00055 #ifndef INDRI_BUFFER_HPP
00056 #define INDRI_BUFFER_HPP
00057 
00058 #include <assert.h>
00059 #include "lemur/lemur-compat.hpp"
00060 
00061 class Buffer {
00062 private:
00063   char* _buffer;
00064   size_t _size;
00065   size_t _position;
00066 
00067 public:
00068   Buffer() :
00069     _buffer(0),
00070     _size(0),
00071     _position(0)
00072   {
00073   }
00074 
00075   ~Buffer() {
00076     free( _buffer );
00077   }
00078 
00079   size_t size() const {
00080     return _size;
00081   }
00082 
00083   size_t position() const {
00084     return _position;
00085   }
00086 
00087   void clear() {
00088     _position = 0;
00089   }
00090 
00091   char* front() {
00092     return _buffer;
00093   }
00094 
00095   char* write( size_t length ) {
00096     grow( _position + length );
00097     char* spot = _buffer + _position;
00098     _position += length;
00099     return spot;
00100   }
00101 
00102   void unwrite( size_t length ) {
00103     assert( length <= _position );
00104     _position -= length;
00105   }
00106   
00107   void grow( size_t newSize ) {
00108     if( newSize > _size ) {
00109       if( newSize < 1024*1024 ) {
00110         // find next larger power of two, up to one megabyte
00111         size_t powSize;
00112         for( powSize = 64; powSize < newSize; powSize *= 2 )
00113           ;
00114         newSize = powSize;
00115       } else {
00116         // round to nearest megabyte
00117         newSize = (newSize + 1024*1024) & ~(1024*1024-1);
00118       }
00119 
00120       char* newBuffer = (char*) malloc( newSize );
00121       memcpy( newBuffer, _buffer, _position );
00122       free( _buffer );
00123       _buffer = newBuffer;
00124       _size = newSize;
00125     }
00126   }
00127 
00128   void grow() {
00129     if( _size == 0 )
00130       grow(64);
00131     else
00132       grow(_size*2);
00133   }
00134 
00135   void remove( size_t start ) {
00136     memmove( _buffer, _buffer + start, _position - start );
00137     _position -= start;
00138   }
00139 
00140   void detach() {
00141     _size = 0;
00142     _buffer = 0;
00143   }
00144 };
00145 
00146 #endif // INDRI_BUFFER_HPP
